Investor Day is focused on connecting investors with one another through peer-to-peer roundtables, venture-focused stage program, free-form networking, and more.

We’re bummed to share that the event is completely full at this time of the year. If you’re still interested in attending, please sign up on the waitlist and we’ll let you know in case of cancellations. Also, make sure to check out all the amazing other Side Events taking place in the Slush week.[/vc_column_text][nectar_cta btn_style=”basic” heading_tag=”h4″ button_color=”accent-color” Located inside the Meeting Area, at the heart of the Slush venue – the Lounges give an intimate setting to work & wind-down during the Slush days.

20 eligible emerging managers will be invited to our Slush x RAISE LP summit after an application process. The selection committee will be composed of LGT, Axa, Top Tier, Foobar, Isomer Capital, UCLA Investment Company, Northwestern University, Vintage Investment Partners, Integra Global Advisors and Blue Future Partners.
If you’re a European emerging manager (max. Raising fund III) we warmly welcome you to apply here.

WHEN: Slush Day 2 (Dec 1st)
FOR WHOM: Slush LP ticket holders, 20 selected European GPs.
WHERE: Slush main venue
REGISTRATION FOR GPs is now closed. 

This event is very kindly sponsored by Krogerus, Tesi, HSBC Innovation Banking and Nordea.
